content: That's definitely true. Having different definitions of monogamy can create misunderstandings and hurt feelings, so it's important to be clear with each other about what you both want and expect from the relationship. And ultimately, relationships should be about mutual respect, love, and support, regardless of what model works best for you. As long as both partners are honest, communicative and upholds their commitment to each other, they should be able to find what works for them.
